title: The Going Merry: One Piece Episodes 537-541: The Sun Pirates Set Sail
author: The Going Merry: A One Piece Review Podcast
description: Covers One Piece episodes 537-541 from the Fishman Island arc. Discusses Luffy's reunion with Jinbe and the backstory of Fisher Tiger and Queen Otohime, who fought to end prejudice between fishmen and humans.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for episodes 537-541 of the Fishman Island arc

title: One Piece – Fishman Island Arc (Episodes 523 – 538) Review
author: Hogan Reviews
description: A comprehensive review of the first half of the Fishman Island arc, including episode 537. Notes that the arc gets off to a painfully slow and often unfunny start but builds as it progresses.

title: 536-537: The Battle in the Ryugu Palace! Zoro vs Hordy! and Keep Shirahoshi Safe! Decken Close Behind!
author: Never Watched One Piece (Tumblr)
description: A blog post reviewing episodes 536-537, describing Vander Decken as 'a total incel' and discussing Luffy's beatdown of him after he threatened Shirahoshi. Praises Neptune's care for his people regarding the Energy Steroids threat.

title: Episode 537 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page for Episode 537 including plot summary, character appearances, trivia, and production details. Notes the episode had a 10.4% TV rating and ranked 5th for the week.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains full episode details and spoilers

title: One Piece Episode 537 Recap and Analysis
author: @ezeekat
description: A short-form video recap and analysis of One Piece Episode 537 on TikTok.

title: One Piece: Fishman Island (517-574) - Episode 537: Keep Shirahoshi Safe! Decken Close Behind!
author: Crunchyroll
description: Official streaming source for Episode 537 on Crunchyroll. Sanji's reaction to seeing Princess Shirahoshi, Luffy's battle with Vander Decken, and Zoro's fight with Hody Jones.

title: One Piece #537 - Keep Shirahoshi Safe! Decken Close Behind!
author: Comic Vine
description: Database entry for Episode 537 with episode information and user ratings.

title: One Piece's New Remaster Makes One Iconic Sanji Scene Funnier Than Ever
author: ComicBook.com
description: Article discussing how the One Piece Log: Fish-Man Island Saga remaster enhanced Sanji's petrification scene when he sees Shirahoshi, making it even more comedic.
